backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user‑scoped session storage, category analysis, reconsideration stats, and access‑controlled save/query operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing concise summaries for all frontend files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark design tokens and base styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with routing, theme provider, layout, and authenticated routes for loop, history, session details, and analytics.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Auth wrapper that prompts unauthenticated users to sign in and otherwise renders children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with query cache clearing on sign‑out.
frontend/src/components/layout/GlassCard: Reusable glass‑styled container div with blur and border aesthetics.
frontend/src/components/layout/MinimalNa: Minimal navigation bar linking to Loop, History, and Analytics with active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/ux/DelayedAction: Button that enables after a short delay to encourage user pause before acting.
frontend/src/components/ux/FadeIn.tsx: A wrapper component that fades in its children after an optional delay using CSS transitions.
frontend/src/features/analytics/Analytic: Displays the analytics dashboard with three metric cards inside a FadeIn container.
frontend/src/features/analytics/widgets/: Shows the most common decision category, fetching category counts and displaying the top result or a skeleton/empty state.
Fetches and displays the percentage of reconsidered decisions, with loading and static info text.
Analyzes session timestamps to determine the most active time of day and displays the leading period.
frontend/src/features/history/PastDecisi: Lists all past decision sessions with timestamps and summaries, linking to their detailed pages.
frontend/src/features/history/SessionDet: Shows full details of a specific session including metadata and all stage responses, with navigation back to history.
frontend/src/features/loop/LoopScreen.ts: Routes the user through the reflection loop stages based on the loop machine’s current state.
frontend/src/features/loop/stages/Comple: Final step of the loop allowing category selection and saving the session before reset or navigation.
frontend/src/features/loop/stages/IdleSc: Initial screen where the user enters an action title to start the reflection loop.
frontend/src/features/loop/stages/Stage1: Asks the user if they want to proceed with the action, offering delayed yes/no buttons.
frontend/src/features/loop/stages/Stage2: Handles stage 2 prompts asking if an action aligns with the user's future self and collects a follow-up yes/no or text response.
frontend/src/features/loop/stages/Stage3: Shows a reflection screen summarizing the user's choice and alignment, prompting them to continue or reconsider.
Displays a gate screen asking the user to explicitly accept consequences before proceeding.
frontend/src/features/loop/stages/Stage4: Presents a visual comparison of short-term vs long-term effects with optional heartbeat audio and a completion button.
frontend/src/features/loop/types.ts: Defines loop stage types, loop state structure, and available action categories.
frontend/src/features/loop/useLoopMachin: Implements a state machine managing loop progression, responses, decisions, and resets.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login handling, identity persistence, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching sessions, stats, category analysis, and saving session data.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and custom animation utilities.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function for merging Tailwind class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and extended theme settings.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata including app goals, architecture notes, required images, and implemented feature records.
